name: The Last Day (itch) (BraveRobot)
description:
Synopsis

You have been isolated in quarantine without prior notice. you must survive a determined amount of time without damaging your home in order to avoid to pay the bond. Occasionally all will start to fail and you are the only one able to solve the mess before all is destroyed.

Game made for the CoronavirusGameJam

Controls
  • Move: WASD
  • Move Camera: Mouse
  • Interactuate with object: Press/Keep E button
  • Pick object: Mouse left click
  • Throw object: Mouse right click
  • Dash: Left shift key
Credits

Game Desing: Arnau Roig

Programmers: Toni Noguera, Arnau Roig, BraveRobot

3D Modeler:  Laia Barreto

Sounds used from https://freesound.org/s/328177/
